title: Primary Teachers Quarterly
additional-notes: Copyrights for magazines with the same title but for other Protestant churches were also registered in some of the same years as the Presbyterian publication described here.  We do not know if they shared content in common.
We are not sure when publication of this title ended, but we have not to date found signs of issues published after the 1940s.  Other periodicals titled 'Primary Teacher' continued later, however.
